title: Uppies! <3
description: A simple rhythmic dodging game, created for a Game Jam. Move your little guy around the stage using "Uppies" and avoid musically synced waves of danger (and explosions)!

title: Squidwords
description: An action-typing game with tower defense elements, made for my college's Capstone Project. Repel the oncoming swarms of hungry squids by chaining together powerful letter combos!

title: PRO310-DPP Project
description: A 2D tech demo of collision detection/systems, designed for efficient & clean memory usage.
